programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring John Goodman and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring Elizabeth Taylor. Helped by his best friend and neighbour, Barney Rubble, Fred Flintstone wins a job promotion at the local quarry. But as other employees, including Barney, are sacked, Fred discovers that he has been tricked into an embezzlement scam Brian Levant - Director, Brian Levant - Director John Goodman - Fred Flintstone Elizabeth Perkins - Wilma Flintstone Rick Moranis - Barney Rubble Rosie O'Donnell - Betty Rubble Kyle MacLachlan - Cliff Vandercave Halle Berry - Miss Stone Elizabeth Taylor - Pearl Slaghoople Dann Florek - Mr Slate Richard Moll - Hoagie Irwin Keyes - Joe Rockhead Elaine Silver - Pebbles Melanie Silver - Pebbles John Goodman - Fred Flintstone Elizabeth Perkins - Wilma Flintstone Rick Moranis - Barney Rubble Rosie O'Donnell - Betty Rubble Kyle MacLachlan - Cliff Vandercave Halle Berry - Miss Stone Elizabeth Taylor - Pearl Slaghoople Dann Florek - Mr Slate Richard Moll - Hoagie Irwin Keyes - Joe Rockhead Elaine Silver - Pebbles Melanie Silver - Pebbles.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Michelle Monaghan. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is retired from active duty and trying to live a quiet life with his new fiancée, Julia. When an operative he personally trained is kidnapped while investigating ruthless arms dealer Owen Davian, Hunt agrees to help rescue her, but the mission goes disastrously wrong J J Abrams - Director, J J Abrams - Director Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Philip Seymour Hoffman - Owen Davian Michelle Monaghan - Julia Ving Rhames - Luther Billy Crudup - Musgrave Jonathan Rhys Meyers - Declan Keri Russell - Lindsey Laurence Fishburne - Theodore Brassel Maggie Q - Zhen Eddie Marsan - Brownway Simon Pegg - Benji Dunn Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Philip Seymour Hoffman - Owen Davian Michelle Monaghan - Julia Ving Rhames - Luther Billy Crudup - Musgrave Jonathan Rhys Meyers - Declan Keri Russell - Lindsey Laurence Fishburne - Theodore Brassel Maggie Q - Zhen Eddie Marsan - Brownway Simon Pegg - Benji Dunn.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.sub-title: Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Musical, Children's, Arts And Culture, Sci Fi ║ 2004 ║ PG
programme.desc: Seasonal animated fantasy featuring Tom Hanks. On Christmas Eve, a young boy lies in bed pondering if Santa Claus really exists. programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
programme.desc: Action spy thriller starring Tom Cruise and Hayley Atwell. IMF agent Ethan Hunt once again goes rogue when he realises that, for the sake of humanity, he must destroy a terrifying weapon that his bosses are desperate to track down and use: an all-powerful AI that has already gained sentience. programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christian Bale. When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. After a period in the Far East where he learns disciplined fighting skills and the power to channel his rage from the enigmatic Henri Ducard, the now adult Wayne returns to a Gotham City riddled with corruption and embarks on a crusade to cleanse the metropolis of crime under the guise of "the Batman" Christopher Nolan - Director, Christopher Nolan - Director Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Henry Cavill and Ben Affleck. programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: War drama based on Anthony Swofford's memoir about his experiences as a marine sniper in the first Gulf War. Young recruit Swofford (Jake Gyllenhaal) impresses Staff Sgt Sykes (Jamie Foxx) during basic training and is invited to join his team where he is partnered with Troy (Peter Sarsgaard). programme.title: Meet Joe Black

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: The One
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: Sci-fi martial arts adventure starring Jet Li. Power-hungry criminal Gabriel Yulaw sets about murdering his alter egos in every parallel universe he visits. programme.title: Madame Web

programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.title: Padosan

programme.title: Khudgarz

programme.title: Shubh Mangal Savdhan

programme.title: Madgaon Express

programme.title: Sam Bahadur
programme.desc: Witness the exemplary story of Sam Manekshaw, who led a new India through 3 major wars until 1971 and became the 1st-ever Indian Army officer to get promoted to the rank of India's 1st field marshal.

programme.title: Raksha Bandhan
programme.desc: Lala Kedarnath is blessed with 4 sisters. But his worry is to find suitable grooms for each of them, as only then can he marry his childhood love. To what lengths will he go to succeed?

programme.title: Mercury
programme.desc: Five friends accidentally kill a man whose vision is impaired. Tension further rises when the man's ghost starts terrorising them in mysterious ways.

programme.title: Phir Teri Kahani Yaad Aayee
programme.desc: A 1993 release. An alcoholic movie director Rahul is devastated by the death of his love Pooja. Later Rahul starts getting phone calls from a girl whose voice resembles Pooja's.

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: City boy Ram falls in love with village belle Sona, who has been raised by her brother, Raghuveer. However, when his mother insults Sona, Raghuveer asks Ram to prove himself worthy of marrying Sona.

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Avinash (Bobby Deol) is arrested for the murder of his wife Sanjana (Lara Dutta). He entrusts his defence to his friend Rohit (Milind Soman). But who really killed Sanjana?

programme.title: Malamaal Weekly
programme.desc: (2006) Lilaram sells lottery tickets and one customer dies of shock upon finding out that he has won a jackpot. Now, Lilaram wants all the money, and so does everyone around him.

programme.title: Kisna - The Warrior Poet
programme.desc: (2005) (Janmashtami Spl) Kisna (Vivek Oberoi) pledges to take Catherine, his childhood friend back to England when freedom fighters vow to kill her. This is the story of their love and journey.

programme.title: Jeete Hai Shaan Se
programme.desc: (Janmashtami Spl) A 1988 release film is about three close friends. Two of them end up becoming enemies after some truths are revealed. Starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Kya Kool Hain Hum 3
programme.desc: Kanhaiya and Rocky make a living by acting in adult movies in Thailand. Things take a turn when he falls in love with Shalu, and finds it hard to convince her conservative father.

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Dil Aashna Hai
programme.desc: (1991) Laila (Divya Bharti) is brought up by 3 women, but they are not ready to divulge who her real mother is. But Laila is determined to find out the truth about her mother.

programme.title: Players

programme.title: Anjaana Anjaani
programme.desc: When a suicidal Akash plans to jump off the Manhattan bridge, he meets a heartbroken Kiara there. The two decide to accomplish their unfulfilled wishes before they end their lives.

programme.title: Ankhiyon Ke Jharoke Se
programme.desc: (1978) Tearjerker in which Arun (Sachin) has to come to terms with a broken engagement with Lily (Ranjeeta), while she battles blood cancer. The soft music is the icing on the cake.

programme.title: Don

programme.title: The One (2001)
programme.desc: Power-hungry agent Jet Li scours the universes killing off alternate versions of himself. Now, only one version remains. Sci-fi thriller with Jason Statham and Carla Gugino. (2001)(84mins).

programme.title: Assassin Club

programme.desc: A kung-fu fighter is mistaken for a fugitive while searching for his runaway brother. Jackie Chan stars. (1980)(93 mins).

programme.title: Leeds United v Lazio 2000/01
programme.desc: We revisit the thrilling 2000/01 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Leeds and Lazio at Elland Road. Surprise package Leeds had already guaranteed a quarter-final place.

programme.title: Manchester United v Porto 2003/04
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League last 16 second leg between Man Utd and Jose Mourinho's Porto at Old Trafford. United lost the first leg 2-1, with Roy Keane seeing red.

programme.title: Liverpool v Juventus 2004/05
programme.desc: We revisit the 2004/05 UEFA Champions League quarter-final first leg between Liverpool and Juventus at Anfield, the first game between the sides since the 1985 Heysel disaster.

programme.title: Liverpool v Chelsea 2004/05
programme.desc: We revisit the dramatic 2004/05 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Liverpool and Chelsea at Anfield. The tie was finely poised after the first leg finished 0-0.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2007/08
programme.desc: A look back at the semi-final second leg from the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. A tense first leg at Anfield had finished 1-1.

programme.title: Liverpool v Real Madrid 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit a dramatic night at Anfield as Liverpool faced Real Madrid in the last 16 second leg of the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League. The Reds were 1-0 up from the first leg.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. Chelsea were impressive 3-1 first leg winners at Anfield.

programme.title: Inter Milan v Tottenham 2010/11
programme.desc: We revisit the 2010/11 UEFA Champions League group stage clash between Inter Milan and Tottenham at the San Siro. The match saw Gareth Bale announce himself on the world stage.

programme.title: Real Madrid v B. Munich 2011/12

programme.title: Man City v Barcelona 2014/15
